price: 18. Mpe Allah alimboleli bino mikapo polele. Mpe Allah azali moyebi atonda bwanya.
arabic: وَيُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wayubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-āyāti wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
